content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump (position x=-7.5, y=25.5), small-electric-pole (position x=7.5, y=-0.5), small-electric-pole (position x=3.5, y=0.5), and small-electric-pole (position x=7.5, y=0.5)

### Copper plate and iron plate factory at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-84.0) 
- Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-82.0) 
- Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-80.0) 

### Stone brick factory at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of furnace (position x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with no power and no input

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups with different fluid systems and statuses

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using get_entities
- Make sure the entity you are trying to get exists on the map before attempting to get it
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when connecting entities to power network
- Make sure the entity is connected to the power network before attempting to use it
### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure the pipe group is not empty and has a valid fluid system before attempting to use it
### Errors when using lab
- Make sure the lab has power and input before attempting to use it
